venue.name: Hess Gas - Intersection Mass Pike, Rt 128, and Commonwealth Ave

item.description:
We will ride the Kang and Hurracane Mtn road and spend some time carving up the NH countryside. We can expect a sunny day in the 90's. Return time will be before sun down ~8:00

KSU (kick stands up) will be at 5:00AM at the Hess in newton on rt 30, then we pickup Jim in Chelmsford at 5:30, then Joe just up the road at the DD on 110 at 5:45 and head to the Owl diner in Lowell for Breakfast when the open at 6AM - everything always takes longer than you expect, so plan on this timetable slipping a bit.

Running late? No worries! Call or text me at 617-584-4797
item.name: New Hampster Adventure
